text: The Solution Movement (Hungarian: Megoldás Mozgalom, MEMO) is a political party. It was started in 2021 by businessman György Gattyán. The party was made for the 2022 Hungarian parliamentary election, but it did not win any seats. The Solution Movement has mayors in three villages: Drávapiski, Szamossályi, and Mátraballa. ==References== Category:Political parties in Hungary
title: Solution Movement
